channel.title: CI on Bluepie's Journal

item.title: Android CI on Github
item.description: Been busy, its not like I lost interest in posting here, I just didn’t allocate time for writing here, which is the opposite of what I set out to do.. which in turn does not track my progress at all, I should be held accountable for my progress. ~pff I hate it. A friend told me in the time that I did not post, not necessarily everything should be a progress, maybe this is right or maybe wrong.
